Have you filed your taxes yet this year?
Just did my taxes last weekend. You know how it goes.
SURPRISE
Did you have to pay a lot this year?
No, I actually got a refund this time.
NEUTRAL
That's great, did you have it directly deposited into your account?
Yes, it was much faster that way.
NEUTRAL
Good call on direct deposit. Hey, how are the kids doing these days?
The kids are doing well, thanks for asking. My daughter just bought her first car.
NEUTRAL
Wow, that's a big step. I'm sure she's excited. Did she get a good deal on it?
She did, but it's still quite an expense. She's trying to save up for a down payment on a house as well.
NEUTRAL
It's tough, isn't it? Buying a car and saving for a house at the same time. But it sounds like she's on the right track.
Yes, she's very responsible with her money. I tried to teach her the importance of financial planning from a young age.
NEUTRAL
That's wonderful. It's so important to have a good financial foundation. I'm sure she'll thank you for it later.
I just wish my ex-husband would contribute more to her expenses. He's always getting out of it somehow.
ANGER
I can understand why that would be frustrating. Have you talked to him about it?
Yes, but he always has an excuse. It's just not fair, we're supposed to be co-parenting!
ANGER
I'm sorry to hear that. It must be tough trying to manage everything on your own.
It is. I work hard and try to provide for my kids, but it feels like I'm doing it all by myself.
ANGER
It sounds like you're feeling overwhelmed. Is there anything I can do to help?
It's nice of you to offer, but there's not much you can do. I just needed to vent.
ANGER
I understand. Sometimes it helps to talk about it. If you ever need to vent again, you know where to find me.
Thanks, I appreciate it. I just need some time to cool off.
ANGER
